introduction: CastGeorge Alexandru ... MusteteaCostel Constantin ... CorcolanGheorghe Dinica   ... LamaFlorian Ghimpu ... LiteraIon HaiducIrina Movila ... LeoMitica Popescu ... MutulDana Rogoz ... IoanaEugenia Serban   ... MariValentin Teodosiu ... ButoiGheorghe VisuFlorin Zamfirescu ... MangiureaPlot / SynopsisParaschiv, known as "The Razor", is a tough convict with 28 years of detention. During the communist regime, he had been an undercover agent and his new mission is to get back in jail and kill a young boy called Litera. Much to everybody's surprise, the two of them form a very special friendship. Litera had become persona non-grata because, back in December 1989, he had happened to see certain very important characters carrying a bag full of dollars. However, instead of playing by the rules, "The Razor" doesn't kill the young boy and thus brings upon him the anger of very influent persons.
